field_speakers.processed:
Speakers:

Zhou Boqun 周博群 (University of Hong Kong)
Roy Porat (Brown University)
Kevin Buckelew (Northwestern University)

Discussant:

Roel Sterckx (University of Cambridge)

field_organizers.processed: Hosted by the Institute of Chinese Literature and Philosophy at Academia Sinica, Taiwan.

field_description.processed: This is the fifth event in the online lecture series "Philology in Our Time: The Early China Project Room," hosted by the Institute of Chinese Literature and Philosophy at Academia Sinica, Taiwan. For paper abstracts and registration please click the "Upcoming Events" tab at the provided URL. Inquiries may be emailed to philologyinourtime@gmail.com.
